lead_paragraph: Boston Red Sox second baseman Dustin Pedroia returned to the 15-day disabled list with a strained right hamstring, the same injury that caused him to miss 16 games before the All-Star break.

headline.main: Dustin Pedroia Is Back on the D.L.
headline.print_headline: Pedroia Is Back on the D.L.

snippet: Boston Red Sox second baseman Dustin Pedroia returned to the 15-day disabled list with a strained right hamstring, the same injury that caused him to miss 16 games before the All-Star break.
